name: Time (itch) (Utne)
description:
A small prototype made for a mini project as part of my education. this was for the course Narrative in digital culture.

The Game is called "TIME" and is made as a re-mediation of the poem "Time is like a river" by Tanu B Singh.  I hope this will make people who experience it, think ones or twice about their life, and how they choose to spend their time with it.
